patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index a16aac53..da984631 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@
     "is-browser": "^2.1.0",
     "lodash.unionby": "^4.8.0",
     "log": "^6.3.1",
-    "lru-cache": "^7.8.1",
+    "lru-cache": "^10.2.0",
     "node-fetch": "^2.6.1",
     "portfinder": "^1.0.28",
     "yargs-parser": "^21.0.1"
diff --git a/src/dns/base.ts b/src/dns/base.ts
index f5b8af86..99bf27e2 100644
--- a/src/dns/base.ts
+++ b/src/dns/base.ts
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 // @ts-ignore
-import LRU from 'lru-cache';
+import { LRUCache } from 'lru-cache';
 import {DynamicChoice} from './choice';
 import {createLogger} from "../log";
 
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ export default abstract class BaseDNS {
   private cache: any;
 
   public constructor(dnsServer: string) {
-    this.cache = new LRU({
+    this.cache = new LRUCache({
       maxSize: cacheSize
     });
 
diff --git a/yarn.lock b/yarn.lock
index 4e59f650..75dd22c2 100644
--- a/yarn.lock
+++ b/yarn.lock
@@ -1499,6 +1499,11 @@ log@^6.3.1:
     type "^2.5.0"
     uni-global "^1.0.0"
 
+lru-cache@^10.2.0:
+  version "10.2.1"
+  resolved "https://registry.yarnpkg.com/lru-cache/-/lru-cache-10.2.1.tgz#e8d901141f22937968e45a6533d52824070151e4"
+  integrity sha512-tS24spDe/zXhWbNPErCHs/AGOzbKGHT+ybSBqmdLm8WZ1xXLWvH8Qn71QPAlqVhd0qUTWjy+Kl9JmISgDdEjsA==
+
 lru-cache@^4.1.2:
   version "4.1.5"
   resolved "https://registry.npmmirror.com/lru-cache/-/lru-cache-4.1.5.tgz#8bbe50ea85bed59bc9e33dcab8235ee9bcf443cd"
@@ -1514,11 +1519,6 @@ lru-cache@^6.0.0:
   dependencies:
     yallist "^4.0.0"
 
-lru-cache@^7.8.1:
-  version "7.18.3"
-  resolved "https://registry.npmmirror.com/lru-cache/-/lru-cache-7.18.3.tgz#f793896e0fd0e954a59dfdd82f0773808df6aa89"
-  integrity sha512-jumlc0BIUrS3qJGgIkWZsyfAM7NCWiBcCDhnd+3NNM5KbBmLTgHVfWBcg6W+rLUsIpzpERPsvwUP7CckAQSOoA==
-
 make-error@^1.1.1:
   version "1.3.6"
   resolved "https://registry.npmmirror.com/make-error/-/make-error-1.3.6.tgz#2eb2e37ea9b67c4891f684a1394799af484cf7a2"
